Package com.app.repository.impl

Class StatisticRepositoryImpl

java.lang.Object
com.app.repository.impl.generic.impl.AbstractCrudRepository<Statistic,Long>
com.app.repository.impl.StatisticRepositoryImpl
All Implemented Interfaces:
CrudRepository<Statistic,Long>, StatisticRepository
@Repository public class StatisticRepositoryImpl extends AbstractCrudRepository<Statistic,Long> implements StatisticRepository
Implementation of the StatisticRepository interface for managing player statistics. This class provides methods to retrieve and delete statistics associated with players.

      Specified by:
      findByPlayerId in interface StatisticRepository
      Parameters:
      playerId - The ID of the player whose statistics are to be retrieved.

    • deleteByPlayerId

      public List<Statistic> deleteByPlayerId(Long playerId)
      Deletes statistics associated with a specific player ID and returns the deleted statistics.
      Specified by:
      deleteByPlayerId in interface StatisticRepository
      Parameters:
      playerId - The ID of the player whose statistics are to be deleted.
      Returns:
